name: Democratic Republic of the Congo
update_reason: FCDO no longer advises against all but essential travel to some areas of Kinshasa. FCDO continues to advise against all travel, or all but essential travel to a number of areas of DRC ('Warnings and insurance', and 'Regional risks' pages).
